resources.string: Apply to mountain roads and intense driving, provide a more dynamic driving experience, biased towards dynamic performance.
Apply to expressways, urban congested road conditions and warm and slippery roads in rainy days, which are biased towards economic performance.
Apply to driving on highways or similar hard roads, taking into account power and economy.
Apply to environments where wheels are prone to skidding such as ice, snow, grass, and gravel. It is recommended to reduce the tire pressure to 70%.
Apply to cross-country long-distance crossing, bumpy roads and other environments. It is recommended to reduce the tire pressure to 70%.
Apply to soft and dry deserts, sand dunes, sandy land, beaches and other environments. It is recommended to reduce the tire pressure to 30%.
Apply to muddy, rut, deep groove and non-paved road surface with uneven surface. It is recommended to reduce the tire pressure to 50%.
Apply to rugged environment such as stony mountain, dry river, log and so on. It is recommended to reduce the tire pressure to 70%.
Apply to driving in deep water with slow speed. It is recommended to reduce the tire pressure to 70%.
